wf_workflow_version.name: OC1 Workflow
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

sys_variable_value.value: // Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;
assigned_toISNOTEMPTY^EQ
assigned_toISNOTEMPTY^EQ
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;
3bf802c20a0a0b52008e2859cd8abcf2
any
reject
${assignment_group}
08fcd0830a0a0b2600079f56b1adb9ae
state=10^EQ
state=10^EQ
any
${assignment_group}
reject

3bf802c20a0a0b52008e2859cd8abcf2
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;
${assigned_to}

You have been assigned an Open Channel Question

wf_activity.name: Notify Requestor and CAB approval group

sys_variable_value.value: // Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.
Question: ${question} has been submitted to the CAB Approval team
${opened_by}
${opened_by}
Question: ${question} has been submitted to the CAB Approval team
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

wf_activity.name: Notify submittor question has a detailed response

sys_variable_value.value: ${opened_by}

Please Review your request by using the link below.
Number: ${number}
